Read plan at `docs/implementation-plan.md` and implement one step from the plan. When finish the step, update the plan file to reflect the progress.

Follow the plan step by step in order. If you encounter any issues or blockers, document them in the plan file, stop and ask.

Keep the code simple and clean. Write tests for new functionality as needed.

Must do one step at a time. After completing each step, update the plan file and stop and ask for confirmation before proceeding to the next step.
